experience.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
experience.subtitle: interwiu.com
experience.description: Developed video conferencing solutions and website features
details: Developed a video conferencing module using Zoom's Video SDK in React.js with core features like video, audio, chat and screen sharing
Incorporated media monitoring timers using event listeners and an idle timer functionality, which cut down session costs by over 30%
Performed DOM manipulation using React Hooks efficiently avoiding re-renders, eliminating glitches and improving website performance
Designed a new coupon code pattern for partner institutions to give multiple discount values using a single coupon for different sessions

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.subtitle: Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur
experience.description: Principal Guide: Prof. Vishnu C. Nair, Deysarkar Centre of Excellence in Petroleum Engineering
details: Redesigned an Arduino circuit for a 4-20mA industrial pressure sensor, using a moving average algorithm for stable pressure logging
Developed a PyQt5 GUI for calculating interfacial tension of pendant droplets, with real-time capturing from a continuous camera feed
Utilized Canny edge detection and bounding box technique to determine the shape factors for both inverted and non-inverted drops
Implemented UI controls including sliders for contrast adjustment and bounding offsets, enhancing data accuracy in experimental setups

experience.title: Development Team Member
experience.subtitle: Inter IIT Tech Meet 13.0 | IIT Kharagpur
experience.description: Led development for ISRO problem statement
details: Led end-to-end development and deployment of a website for ISRO problem statement, using AWS EC2 for backend and Netlify for frontend
Coordinated with team members, securing second place for the problem statement and contributing to an overall gold in the event

experience.title: Student Member
experience.subtitle: Students' Branding and Relations Cell | Office of Alumni Affairs and Branding | IIT Kharagpur
experience.description: Managed website development and event organization
details: Collaborated with team to develop the Young Innovators Program (yip.iitkgp.ac.in) and SBRC (barc.iitkgp.ac.in) websites from scratch
Conducted the Young Innovators Program 2023, with 1000+ registrations (35% YOY growth); organized guest lectures & exhibitions

experience.title: Embedded Team Member
experience.subtitle: Aerial Robotics Kharagpur
experience.description: Worked on drone simulation and team management
details: Initiated and developed the Gazebo simulation for acrylic window traversal of a drone using ROS packages and sensors, for IMAV 2024
Recruited and trained first year students through aptitude and subject tests, coordinating task rounds and conducting personal interviews

projects.title: Dynamic Elemental Mapping of Moon
details: Built a dashboard that overlays static and dynamic elemental maps on a moon using Three.js including sophisticated animations
Implemented a live mode where data is scraped from ISRO website and tiles are updated based on position of satellite over the moon
Created a file upload functionality where users can upload FITS files to the Django backend and get the updated tiles with new data
Developed and published a package Astro3D, containing ready-to-use detailed models of celestial bodies, minimizing effort of development

projects.title: Django library for Network Log Anomaly Detection
details: Trained multiple supervised models on the UNSW dataset, to classify network logs as attack and normal traffic and evaluated model metrics
Performed 2-Factorial Design on the dataset to study main and interaction effects and applied SHAP on the best model for feature selection
Developed Django decorator functions to block attack IPs using network logs, and published the library to PyPI as django-attack-blocker

projects.title: Breadth Selection Tool
details: Created a Full Stack Breadth Course Recommendation Tool
Achieved 2nd position in the National Science Week Hackathon
